report.title: RSSG2G071 - SGSN Measurement Record Times
report.help-text:
Report shows the date and time of last SGSN records available in NetAct for each measurement type.
Execute MML command
W7I:FEA,FULL:FSTATE=ON;
for getting feature information that can affect PM data view.
report.sql: select sgsn.co_gid from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects sgsn where #object_selection# and plmn.co_oc_id = 16 and sgsn.co_oc_id=463 and sgsn.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid
select ' ' SGSN, -10 MEAS_ID, ' ' M_ABBR, ' ' M_NAME, ' ' M_OBJ, TO_DATE('01/01/2011', 'dd/mm/yyyy') F_RCD, TO_DATE('01/01/2011', 'dd/mm/yyyy') L_RCD, 0 ROW_CNT from dual
delete from #sgsn_meas_071# where meas_id = -10

insert into #sgsn_meas_071# (sgsn,meas_id,m_abbr,m_name,m_obj,f_rcd,l_rcd,row_cnt) SELECT sgsn.co_name sgsn, 1 meas_id, 'MOBMGMNT' m_abbr, 'GPRS Mobility Management for CELL' m_name, 'CELL' m_obj, min(period_start_time) f_rcd, max(period_start_time) l_rcd, decode(count(*), 1, NULL,count(*)) row_cnt from RSG_PS_MOBMGMNT_CELL_RAW p, utp_common_objects sgsn where sgsn.co_gid in (select * from #obj_filter_071#) AND p.sgsn_gid (+) = sgsn.co_gid GROUP BY sgsn.co_name

insert into #sgsn_meas_071# (sgsn,meas_id,m_abbr,m_name,m_obj,f_rcd,l_rcd,row_cnt) SELECT sgsn.co_name sgsn, 1 meas_id, 'MOBMGMN5' m_abbr, 'GPRS Mobility Management for RA' m_name, 'RA' m_obj, min(period_start_time) f_rcd, max(period_start_time) l_rcd, decode(count(*), 1, NULL,count(*)) row_cnt from RSG_PS_MOBMGMN5_RA_RAW p, utp_common_objects sgsn where sgsn.co_gid in (select * from #obj_filter_071#) AND p.sgsn_gid (+) = sgsn.co_gid GROUP BY sgsn.co_name

insert into #sgsn_meas_071# (sgsn,meas_id,m_abbr,m_name,m_obj,f_rcd,l_rcd,row_cnt) SELECT sgsn.co_name sgsn, 1 meas_id, 'MOBMGMN3' m_abbr, 'GPRS Mobility Management for PAPU and SGSN' m_name, 'SGSN - PAPU' m_obj, min(period_start_time) f_rcd, max(period_start_time) l_rcd, decode(count(*), 1, NULL,count(*)) row_cnt from RSG_PS_MOBMGMN3_CELL_RAW p, utp_common_objects sgsn where sgsn.co_gid in (select * from #obj_filter_071#) AND p.sgsn_gid (+) = sgsn.co_gid GROUP BY sgsn.co_name
